title: Ep - 67 -Courtney Kerr And Susie Meister
description:
Courtney Kerr appeared on Bravo’s 2011 docudrama, “Most Eligible Dallas,” which eventually led to a 2013 spinoff show, “Courtney Loves Dallas.” She talks about how she was cast for Most Eligible, the stress of filming Courtney Loves Dallas, whether she watches Real Housewives of Dallas, and life post-show including developing her online magazine KERRently. 


Susie Meister host of the Brain Candy Podcast and a cast member on MTV’s The Challenge reviews an episode of Survivor. 


Comedian, writer, and actress Sarah Colonna discusses her obsession with 90 Day Fiancé and 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com
